key.name: icon-size
key.description: Size of icons in the dock.

key.name: position
key.description: Set the dock position. Can be "Left", "Top" and "Down"

key.name: expand
key.description: Panel expand to all screen width or height.

key.name: space-reserved
key.summary: Reserve screen space for the dock
key.description: Reserve space in the screen for the dock. No application can be over the dock.

key.name: animation-step-size
key.summary: Step size for the dock animation
key.description: The higher the step, the less time animation and vice versa.

key.name: background-transparency
key.description: Must be a value between 0 and 10.
